job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Dematic is a leading supplier of integrated automated technology software and services to optimize supply chain Dematic employs over 9000 skilled logistics professionals to serve its customers globally with engineering centers and manufacturing facilities located around the world Dematic is one brand under the KION Group of companies and has implemented more than 6000 integrated systems for a customer base that includes small medium and large companies doing business in a variety of market sectorsbrbrThis position will be part of the KION Group  Mobile Automation RampD team KION Mobile Automation KMA is the worldleading fastgrowing innovative frontrunner in the development of mobile robotics robotic fleet controllers and cloudbased fleet logistics management systems KMA has a focus on Automated Guided Vehicle AGV systems AGVs are fully autonomous robots that move and transport items in production warehouse and distribution centers without manual intervention or permanent conveying systemsbrbrstrong The Role brbrstrongstronguThe Key Responsibilities Of This Role ArebrbrustrongThis position is for an experienced Software Engineer to join our global KION Mobile Automation Research amp Development team in Holland Michiganbrulli Developing quality software products for our internal and external customers with a focus on offboard software for AGVs and other mechatronic equipment lili Working closely within a cross functional agile RampD team for a range of software product development activities lili Involvement in the full software life cycle including Analysis Build Testing Integration Release and Support activities lili Working in an international environment collaborating with global agile development teams brbrliulstronguWhat We Are Looking Forbrbrustrongstrong What We Are Looking For brbrstrongSuccessful candidates will possess the following qualifications skills amp experiencebrulli Degree in Software Engineering or similar or equivalent experience lili Minimum 5 years experience using C  NET Core SQL Git etc lili Experience with technologies including Object Oriented Programming DockerKubernetes Azure Cloud TCPIP Web Services Message Broker and Angular would be a plus lili Experience designing implementing and delivering complex and interconnected solutions with multiple subsystems lili Experience in the logistics industry warehouse automation or material handling would be a plus lili A passion for delivering high quality software and technical excellence lili Strong analytical and problemsolving skills with a high attention to detail lili Exceptional ability to work both autonomously and with crossfunctional teams to build partnerships and get things done lili A good understanding of Agile software development and Testing principles and practices lili Ability to work well within a team environment lili Open to continious Innovation and learning lili Occasional travel may be required  up to 20 including internationalliul
